name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, communications in most areas of Mentougou District are interrupted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, due to the heavy rain, the K396 train has been stranded for more than 30 hours.
At 21:20 this evening, due to the damage to the railway, the rescuers could not move forward and changed to rescue the local villagers on the spot.
For the trapped passengers, it is currently planned to arrange airdrops of the necessary supplies.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of the 31st, the government dispatched emergency water supply vehicles to support the residents of Mentougou

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The current news is: the passengers have been moved to a safe location, there is enough food, but there is no signal

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the number of help-seeking information has increased to 378, most of which are from Fangshan and Mentougou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On August 1, many people in Hebei searched for help on Weibo
Beijing had heavy rain and flooding, which resulted in the flooding of nearby Baoding Zhuozhou. Many villages were directly destroyed, and people were not relocated, and there was no advance notice

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, Cangzhou, Hebei Province announced the opening of the Xian County flood discharge area

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, Beijing Mentougou district after heavy rain

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the online help documents in Zhuozhou, Hebei have been updated to more than 800 items.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, netizens in many places in Hebei have received the notice of Qinhuangdao banning drones.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On August 1, due to heavy rain and flooding, many trains to Beijing were suspended in Shijiazhuang. This is the scene of ticket refund processing at Shijiazhuang Station at the moment

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Currently, the water depth in some areas of Zhuozhou Huayang Bridge has reached the 3-meter height limit pole next to it

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 1, an accident occurred at the parallel bars competition of the Chengdu Universiade.
During the competition, a competitor's parallel bars were suddenly damaged.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added: It is said that the coach did not install the buckle properly, not the venue's fault

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @wangdisheng2020 The original text is so clear, why are you using a screenshot from Baidu to argue? Are you illiterate or just a bad guy?
